name: IceCube
description:
It's a simple but fun game.

With 10 levels this is sure to keep you entertained for at least 20 minutes cause the last 5 are very hard.

This is my first Unity Project and not my original idea.

I followed this series by Brackeys(first 12 videos).

A few changes to come but not much!

Update 1.1:

I added some more text to the main page,  consisting of controls and the current version and also on the end screen added a back to start button.

Update 1.2:

Some bug fixes when finishing a level, a better score system that shows how far you are in the level and 5 NEW levels!
